Name: S-COPTER: Trials of Quick Fingers and Logic
About the game: S-COPTER is a combination of an arcade game, a platformer and a bit of a puzzle game , viewed from a 2D perspective. The player’s goal is to transport all the passengers on a level to their respective landing sites. To complicate things a bit, there are many obstacles on the way, which, combined with limited life and fuel, force the player to carefully plan every flight. Game Features 40 levels in single-player mode, equipped with many kinds of dangers, just waiting for one wrong move, 20 levels in local cooperation mode, requiring the proper planning and coordination between two players, 10 maps in versus mode, in which there can be only one… surviving player, difficulty so high, that you will hate us forever, hand drawn 2D graphics, game suitable for a five minute break at work, spontaneous beer-meetings with your friends and long sessions of cursing and throwing things.
